description: This version of the  Person Shrugging emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platfo
apple_vendor_description: The dark-skinned person shrugging emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a classic gesture of uncertainty, arms outstretched and palms facing upwards. Apple's design language renders this figure with smooth gradients and softly rounded edges, giving it a friendly and approachable appearance. This emoji is a universal symbol of 'I don't know,' 'who cares,' or a casual dismissal, offering a lighthearted way to convey a lack of knowledge or indifference in messages sent on Apple devices.
